messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
We were having a heated discussion
over Pokémon the way Collectors do.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Knowledge alone isn’t everything,
you know...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I’m more knowledgeable than anyone
else!I have a rare Pokémon!But, I’m weak at battling...
That’s a Pokémon Collector for you...
